Change Log
==========

0.0.5 (23/01/2021)
------------------
- Assert error if torch is not installed. This is a non-permanent solution to error when installing PyTorch

------------------
- Fixed Installment issue

------------------
- Fixed not finding package

0.0.1 (22/01/2021)
------------------
- First release
